coreInnovationsData.title: Core Innovation
coreInnovationsData.subtitle: CORE INNOVATIONS
coreInnovationsData.description: Core innovations of next-generation respiratory solutions realized through original engineering and advanced materials technology

innovations.title: 50x Ultra-light High Capacity Innovation
innovations.subtitle: Ultra High Capacity
innovations.description: 40L high capacity with up to 50x more oxygen than competitors, 2-hour continuous supply, enhanced portability with ultra-light design

innovations.title: Eco-Economic Innovation
innovations.subtitle: Eco-Economic Innovation
innovations.description: Eco-friendly business model, innovation that doesn't restrict existing oxygen users' activities

innovations.title: Retro-Futurism Design
innovations.subtitle: Retro-Futuristic Design
innovations.description: In-ear nasal supply device, ultra-light composite high-pressure vessel

innovations.title: 3-Stage Precision Flow Control
innovations.subtitle: Precision Flow Control
innovations.description: World's first portable oxygen 3-stage precision flow control, customized supply by purpose

innovations.title: Carbon Composite Material
innovations.subtitle: Carbon Composite
innovations.description: Ultra-light carbon composite materials ensuring both portability and durability

innovations.title: Purpose-specific Oxygen Fill
innovations.subtitle: Medical Grade Purity
innovations.description: From high-altitude use to medical-grade high-purity oxygen for safe and effective respiratory support
